comments.body: I would do this test one more time after create_6 to be sure that changed will be false. And also create_6 after that again (so twice in actual mode for one image), just in case, and also check that changed will be false.
That's not necessary, idempotence for started and created containers is already tested in `start-stop.yml`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +71,75 @@    state: absent

- name: Create container with alpine image via name (check mode, will pull, same image)
  docker_container:
    image: alpine:3.8
